title: Configure PWA with Cryonex branding and uploaded logo

requirements.text: Update PWA manifest (frontend/public/manifest.json) to use 'Cryonex' as the app name and short_name
acceptanceCriteria: manifest.json name field is set to 'Cryonex'
manifest.json short_name field is set to 'Cryonex'

requirements.text: Generate PWA icon images from the uploaded Cryonex logo (IMG_20260218_211452.png-1.jpg) in standard PWA sizes: 192x192px and 512x512px

quotes: Use the uploaded file image as logo

acceptanceCriteria: 192x192 icon generated and saved to frontend/public/assets/generated/
512x512 icon generated and saved to frontend/public/assets/generated/
Icons maintain the Cryonex logo design with transparent or appropriate background

requirements.text: Update PWA manifest icons array to reference the newly generated Cryonex logo icons at 192x192 and 512x512 sizes
acceptanceCriteria: manifest.json icons array includes both generated icon paths
Icon src paths point to frontend/public/assets/generated/ directory
Both icons specify correct sizes and type (image/png)
Both icons specify purpose as 'any maskable'

requirements.text: Update the PWA manifest theme_color and background_color to match the app's existing cyan/neon cyberpunk theme using the colors from index.css

quotes: you know what to do with theme

acceptanceCriteria: theme_color uses the cyan accent color from the existing theme
background_color uses the dark background color from the existing theme
Colors are consistent with the app's cyberpunk aesthetic

requirements.text: Update index.html to reference the Cryonex app name in the title tag
acceptanceCriteria: HTML title tag displays 'Cryonex' or 'Cryonex - [appropriate subtitle]'
Title is visible in browser tab

requirements.text: Add Apple touch icon link in index.html pointing to the 512x512 generated Cryonex logo for iOS PWA support
acceptanceCriteria: Apple touch icon link tag added to index.html head
Link references the 512x512 generated icon path

constraints: Do not modify existing service worker cache strategy logic
Do not change the app's existing cyberpunk/neon theme colors except for PWA manifest updates
Keep all existing PWA infrastructure (service worker, manifest structure) intact
nonGoals: Adding new PWA features beyond logo and branding updates
Changing the app's visual design or layout

required: Cryonex logo icon optimized for PWA with transparent background, showing the 'CX' letters with cyan glow and red lightning bolt (cryonex-icon-192.dim_192x192.png)
Cryonex logo icon optimized for PWA with transparent background, showing the 'CX' letters with cyan glow and red lightning bolt (cryonex-icon-512.dim_512x512.png)
